meanings.definition: Relating to water or water-based activities.
meanings.sent1: The aquatics center offers swimming lessons for all ages.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys participating in aquatics sports during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The aquatics competition was so intense that even the fish were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as fluid and graceful as the movements in aquatics.
meanings.sent5: The aquatics program helped her overcome her fear of water.

meanings.definition: The practice or sport of swimming or other water-based activities.
meanings.sent1: Aquatics is a popular choice for physical exercise.
meanings.sent2: The school's aquatics team won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: During the aquatics class, they had a race using inflatable ducks.
meanings.sent4: His passion for aquatics began when he learned to swim in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sound of splashing water filled the air during the aquatics event.
